description: This is the description of Home in the navbar

Vision for USSTM: To build a community where every student feels valued, supported, and inspired to reach their full potential.

Mission Statement: To provide accessible support for student growth and development.

subItems.description: Find our By-Laws and Constitution here. See how USSTM is structured.
Giving recognition to the Past BoDs
Interested in attending our meetings or want to see what was done? Visit this page for all this info and more.

description: Dive into a world of exciting opportunities with USSTM's vibrant events! We offer a diverse range of experiences to enhance your university journey.

subItems.description: Stay up-to-date with all our scheduled activities and never miss an event!
Our key events providing an overview of the vibrant and diverse activities organized by USSTM each year.
Memorable moments, photos, and highlights from USSTM events throughout the years!
Get ready for the best week of your life! USSTM Orientation is a week-long event that will introduce you to the Science community.

description: Embark on an academic adventure with USSTM! Our academic initiatives are designed to support and enrich your learning experience.

subItems.description: Have feedback for your professors but don't want to contact them directly? We can do it for you through our Academic Feedback Form!
Synergize is USSTM's annual case comp which has an emphasis on innovative tech.
Struggling with a first or second year course? USSTM Crash Courses may be exactly what you need.

description: Discover how we allocate resources to best serve you, the students. Gain insight into the financial decisions driving our initiatives. Understanding our financial structure empowers you to engage with us and shape the future of student support and services.

subItems.description: Offers transparency regarding how funds are allocated to support student initiatives and programs
Want to attended a conferences, case comp or hackathon? USSTM can give you funding to repersent TMU Science!
Learn about our financial policies, guiding the management and allocation of funds to ensure the sustainability and growth of USSTM.
Discover the innovation behind our DMZ Startup Certified program, empowering entrepreneurs to turn ideas into successful businesses.

description: Get involved and be a part of the vibrant USSTM community!  Stay updated on the latest community news and find ways to make a difference on campus and beyond. Join us in building a strong, supportive community that fosters growth, inclusivity, and collaboration.

subItems.description: We have various different clubs for all the different areas in science. See an area that hasn't been filled? Learn how to create a student group!
KHE223 is an area for all science students to study or chill. Come find out what can be found in the Sci-Lounge!
Where you have the power to shape the future of USSTM.
